page.title: 05BOAT HOLIDAYS IN NORFOLK
page.content: The Norfolk Broads provide a holiday venue for thousands of people each year.Many miles of navigable waterways allow leisurely freedom, although popular localities become very crowded.Much of Broadland's most picturesque scenery is only accessible by boat.The rivers Yare,Waveney and Bure flow into Breydon Water making it a busy cross- roads in high season.Local firms hire boats of various sizes on a weekly or daily basis.Many small river-side settlements depend on tourism for their livelihood. Problems have arisen due to boat holidays.River banks have been eroded and fuel spillage has caused some pollution.
